h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
h2_title: How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm
content: Go toward it, and as you get closer, you can see a dragon ing with lightning in the water to the left. As you approach the area, Admiral Bajie will tell you he sees a familiar face.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
Go toward it, and as you get closer, you can see a dragon ing with lightning in the water to the left. As you approach the area, Admiral Bajie will tell you he sees a familiar face.
